item.name: davidh
item.message: <@U03L85HNF>, <@U038Z6LG9> the SPARC AERI is now on webmads

item.name: davidh
item.message: I’d say give it 10 to 15 minutes for all the cron jobs to run but I think everything is switched over to an “SSEC” experiment.

item.name: davidh
item.message: alright I think I’m going to move things over and switch the experiment over to a single “SSEC” experiment. If we run in to problems with that we’ll have to come up with something else. I see pros and cons for both ways that we’ve thought of so far, but one “SSEC” experiment requires less human intervention.

item.name: davidh
item.message: Since right now we would have to change it by hand for every year I think it makes sense to make one SSEC directory

item.name: davidh
item.message: yeah I think we left it with I was going to decide later what to do, but then I never did decide before the end of the year.

item.name: eriko
item.message: I’m open to changing to something different

item.name: eriko
item.message: I thought that we talked about this when the trailer came back from CHARMS. Hence the SSEC_2015 and the plan to break up the random data while at the building into chunks by year?

item.name: davidh
item.message: ok, I think we need to make it one experiment directory called “SSEC” when it’s here. It gets too complicated with changing things.

item.name: eriko
item.message: Should have done it early this month, but I didn’t think of it. I changed it about 5:30 last night. Yes, it was on my list to tell you today.

item.name: davidh
item.message: ok, you need to tell me when you do that because there is stuff running on the metobs servers that depends on the experiment names

item.name: davidh
item.message: <@U04LDJXDC>: did you change the SPARC experiment to SSEC_2016?

item.name: davidh
item.message: <@U04LDJXDC>, could you remind me what the model for the GPS was during PECAN?
